properties.property: #{currentDocument.type eq 'BomPart' ? bomPartCharacteristicsRoot : (currentDocument.type eq 'BomProduct' ? bomProductCharacteristicsRoot : (currentDocument.type eq 'BomPackaging' ? bomPackagingCharacteristicsRoot : (currentDocument.type eq 'BomSpecification' ? bomSpecificationCharacteristicsRoot : (currentDocument.type eq 'BomTool' ? bomToolCharacteristicsRoot : '' ))))}

configuration.title: BOM Part classification multilevel select widget

description.p: This widget type displays the BOM Part classification selection, which is currently a multilevel classification.

It requires the following fields configuration:
field: the value holding the multilevel selection
